title: How much does FL Studio 20 cost? - Quora

response.answer_text: FL Studio is currently on version 20.5, which has 4 different versions, all at different prices:[1] Fruity Edition - $99Producer Edition - $199Signature Bundle - $299FL Studio ALL PLUGINS - $899Remember, you can download a trial version (limited features), for free, and FL STUDIO 10 and up include Lifetime Free Updates[2]. Boxes 9 and below require the purchase of a USD $39 Lifetime Free Update extension. Footnotes[1] Image-Line Shop[2] Lifetime free updates
